mapper.update: update "sources" set id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uts = #{uts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, uri = #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repo_id = #{repoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_id = #{sensorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select source_id, id, uts, name, type, uri, repo_id, sensor_id, status, comment from "sources"
